alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 1:36AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gulf, southwestern Wakulla, Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 215 AM EST/115 AM CST/... At 135 AM EST/1235 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 17 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, East Camp, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Kern, Willis Landing, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole, Dalkeith, Fort Gadsden and Buck Siding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
